fullDescription.intro:
This node can be used to load java classes from a file (output from Maven plugin SourceCrawler or this plugin - see advanced options) or load them directly from directory.
To create xml file from standalone version of SourceCrawler you can use command java -jar sourcecrawler.jar -i ./dir/to/scan -o ./dir/output.xml You can find sourcecrawler.jar in lib directory of this plugin. For more information visit https://github.com/ImpressiveCode/ic-utils.
This node analyzes information about every class in every .java file from the given directory or xml file which has been found by SourceCrawler and returns a table with the following data:
Class name
Package
Class access
Class type
Does class represent an exception
Is the class inside another
Is this a class used for testing
Is this class final
File path
fullDescription.option: Select a file from previous SourceCrawler use or a directory with java files
Accept only classess of certain attriubutes
Accept classes described as Exception, Inner, Test or Final
A file will be created, which can be used as input for SourceCrawler

ports.outPort: Table with Java classes with their properties
